item.title: The Windows File Explorer replacement, File Pilot, is awesome
item.description: In this post I describe my experience with the Windows File Explorer replacement, File Pilot. It's blazingly fast, feature rich, and has hotkeys everywhere Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/windows-explorer-replacement-filepilot-is-awesome/
